p: Developing novel and effective pesticides is a major challenge today, to allow the effective and eco-friendly management of arthropod pests [ 15, 16]. In the present work, we evaluated the toxicity of BEO on larvae of the filariasis, Culex quinquefasciatus Say, adults of the housefly, Musca domestica L. and larvae of the noctuid moth Spodoptera littoralis (Boisduval). In addition, its impact on non-target organisms, such as the aquatic microcrustacean Daphnia magna Straus, was assessed. The chemical composition of BEO was obtained by gas chromatography-mass spectrometry (GC-MS) and the isomer of ascaridole was ascertained by 1H- and 13C-NMR spectroscopy.
